<h1 align="center">ArabicNormalization</h1>



### What is ArabicNormalization?
It is a python library that contains aclass to normalize arabic text 

### Support
+ linux
+ termux

### Install
Just write this code on terminal:
```shell
pip3 install ArabicNormalization
```
